product.question: How do I scan slides?
product.answer: You can scan slides using the JE Transparency Adapter (part number STA8901) available from Jackson Electronics.
product.question: Where can I find the latest drivers for my ScanMaster?
product.answer: You can download the latest software drivers from the Jackson Electronics Web page.

How do I fax with my ScanMaster?
product.answer: You can turn your scanner into a fax machine by purchasing the FaxRight add-on component (part number STA4500) available from Jackson Electronics.
